alert.note: Alert for Orange (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 16 at 5:08AM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Orange County through 600 AM EDT... At 508 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Unionville, or 7 miles east of Port Jervis, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Middletown, Goshen, Howells, Cuddebackville, Otisville, Huguenot, Unionville, Scotchtown, Mechanicstown, Westtown, Slate Hill, Pine Island, Circleville, Bullville and New Hampton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
